title: (x) "Jungfrau" Nike T-shirt - Citadel Script/Kuenstler Script, Helvetica {Rainer, Hungryghost}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134520im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1_6711.jpg)
  
1. Tun sie es einfach  
2. Jungfrau  
3. Aus
 [‹ (x) Canada's Wonderland logo - Clearface Gothic {Lex}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134520/http:/typophile.com/node/34756 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Looking for a similar font to Skinny Eric - various {gang} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134520/http:/typophile.com/node/34732 "Go to next forum topic")
author: marcadonbalon

comments.content:
[Citadel Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20071010134520/http:/www.identifont.com/show?4I9)  
Helvetica Medium (italic) probably. (Or Arial??? hmpff)  
and  
probably Futura for »Niedriges Lager …«

And don’t forget to set the upper sentence with the correct uppercase »Sie«:

_Tun **S** ie es einfach._
Looks like Kuenstler script for the ’Jungfrau’.

There’s also some Avant Garde in there (Niedriges Lager No2268).

- Lex
